pnp:DataRow.pnp:DataValue: Is the assignment order signed and received?
Are foundation documents attached (reports, investigations, drawings)?
Are relations with authorities clarified (regulatory plans, etc.)?
Is the contract signed by both parties?
Are environmental requirements for the project defined?
Is the financial framework reasonable in relation to the scope of the assignment?
Has gaming fund subsidy been applied for the project? If so, has it been agreed how this should be accounted for?
Are there other financing sources in the project? If so, has it been agreed how this should be accounted for?
Has it been clarified whether the project is entitled to 100% VAT deduction?
Has a progress plan been prepared for the assignment?
Has consideration been given to processing time with external actors? (political P&B, county governor, Hafslund, NVE, Norwegian Public Roads Administration, others)?
Are requirements for universal design defined?
Are all archive-worthy documents stored in the archive system?
Has the property register for registered rights been checked and is it OK?
Has it been checked with the county municipality if cultural monuments are registered or should be registered in the construction area?
Has it been checked with the county municipality if there are requirements for archaeological registrations in the construction area (must be done in the summer half-year)?
Has it been verified that nature type registrations have been made in the construction area (must be done in the summer half-year)?
Have all relevant stakeholders been contacted? Including KTA - operations, neighbors/landowners and cable companies?
Are all rights issues clarified with landowners?
Is VAT distribution key agreed with KTA and entered in Agresso?
Has an agreement been written for HSE coordination design (KP)?
Has an agreement been written for HSE coordination execution (KU)?
Is the application for framework permit approved?
Is the competition basis quality assured?
Have completed self-reporting forms for wages and working conditions been received?
Are all archive-worthy documents stored in the archive system?
Has advance notice been sent to the labor inspection?
Have measures from stakeholder analysis and possible communication plan been implemented?
Is the application for IG (commencement) approved?
Are risk assessment and HSE plan updated?
Is environmental plan updated and followed up?
Are all archival documents stored in the archive system?
Are all defects and deficiencies corrected?
Have operations personnel and users received necessary training?
Is the delivery protocol to the client signed?
Is a final report with final accounting written?
Are evaluation reports of contractors written?
Are all outstanding amounts paid to contractors?
Are all archival documents stored in the archive system?
Support the client in defining requirements and framework as needed
Ensure signed assignment order;Clarify economic framework/experience figures
Perform peer review of assignment description
Assess need for preliminary conference or framework application;Preliminary calculation;Conduct environmental review and possibly write environmental plan;Conduct risk analysis (internal)
Establish HSE plan for design phase

Complete tender drawings and requirements specification;Framework permit application shall be prepared and sent to Planning and Building for approval;Prepare complete calculation;Conduct external ROS analysis (for projects over 10 mill);Submit political case
Documents to be produced in the design phase

Organization plan/project plans;Plan documents;Changes to assignment description;Submitted application for building permit (Pramework application or 1st stage application);HSE plan (with attachments);Checklist HSE coordinator Design (KP);Project risk assessment (Excel form);Complete calculation;Preliminary project report;Application for pre-approval of gaming funds;Political case presentation;Stakeholder analysis;Agreements with cable companies;Signed landowner agreements;Neighbor information (sent out);Basis for announcing competition (in Doffin);(Preliminary) progress plan
Prepare competition documents including requirements specification and tender drawings
Perform peer review of competition documents;Review quantity description and tender documents
Documents to be produced in the contracting phase

Competition documents - construction;Procurement protocol over 500,000 kr. (with evaluation report);Opening protocol;Protocol from bid inspection;Agreement on HSE coordination execution (KU);Notice to bidders;Signed contract(s);Completed self-reporting form for wages and working conditions;Budget
Documents to be produced in the construction phase

Advance notice to labor inspection;Organization plan/project plans;Progress plan (updated);HSE plan with attachments (updated);Environmental plan - construction projects (Prepared in design phase; further developed and followed up in implementation phase);Working drawings;Survey data;Correspondence;Possibly updated stakeholder analysis;Possibly updated information to neighbors and landowners;Possibly updated budget;O&M/final documentation
Documents to be produced in the delivery phase

Minutes from final inspection;Signed handover protocol;Evaluation reports;Minutes from meeting on financial settlement;Signed delivery protocol;Completed O&M/final documentation;Final report with final accounts;Final accounts and completion certificate as basis for application for final payment of gaming funds.
Is the main safety representative consulted/involved?
Is AMU or union representative consulted/involved?
Is the council for People with reduced functional ability contacted for statement in connection with universal design?
Is the municipal medical officer and/or Environmental health service consulted/involved?
Are all archival documents stored in the archive system?
Is the checklist for assignment description filled out and discussed with PRU?
Are options for service and maintenance of the building included in the tender documentation?
Are options for service and maintenance of green areas included in the tender documentation?
Is the main safety representative consulted/involved?
Is AMU or union representative consulted/involved?
Has the council for people with disabilities been contacted for statement in connection with universal design?
Has a project manager with road/facility construction competence been consulted/involved?
Is VAT distribution key entered in Agresso?
Has an agreement been written for HSE coordination design (KP)?
Has an agreement been written for HSE coordination execution (KU)?
Is the application for framework permit approved?
Is the competition basis quality assured?
Have completed self-reporting forms for wages and working conditions been received?
Are all archival documents stored in the archive system?
Has advance notice been sent to the labor inspection?
Have measures from stakeholder analysis and possible communication plan been implemented?
Is the application for IG (commencement) approved?
Is risk assessment and HSE plan updated?
Is environmental plan updated and followed up?
Are installations and completion of building technical installations tested and found OK?
Are coordinated start-up and system function tests of the technical installations performed and documented?
Have representatives from EDF participated in preliminary inspection?
Have representatives from Nature and Sports participated in preliminary inspection of outdoor areas?
Have representatives from KTA participated in preliminary inspection?
Has the report from preliminary inspection with defect list been recorded?
Have integrated tests been performed that can confirm that the technical installations function in interaction across system and contractor boundaries?
Have full-scale (simulation of ordinary operation) tests been conducted and accepted?
Have stability and performance tests of technical installations been conducted and accepted?
Has operational personnel participated in full-scale tests?
Is O&M documentation completed and approved by EDF?
If applicable; is a plan for remedying deficiencies established?
Has responsibility for any follow-up of deficiencies and change requests been clarified?
Has a meeting plan for the trial operation period been prepared?
Has it been clarified with EDF and controller how much project funds should be set aside for the 1st trial operation/1st operating year?
For schools and kindergartens: have we received environmental health approval from the Labour Inspection Authority?
Er alle arkivverdige dokumenter lagret i arkivsystemet?
Is the checklist for operation startup filled out?
Has a final report with final accounts been written?
Have evaluation reports been written for the contractors?
Have all outstanding amounts been paid to the contractors?
Are all archival documents stored in the archive system?
Assess sites, traffic conditions, energy solutions etc (see Checklist for assignment agreement - construction)
Make overall cost assessments/budget allocation for the various alternatives
Clarify needs - Room and Functional Program (P1)
Contact HVO and AMU;Write organizational plan;Hold startup meeting;Establish reporting routines;Update/conduct stakeholder analysis
Clarify needs - Room and Functional Program (P1)
Prepare competition basis for architect/consultant;Announce competition(s);Evaluate bids;Hold contract meeting;Draft and sign agreement document
Clarify needs - Room and Functional Program (P1)

Investigate and describe several different alternatives (if relevant);Assess advantages and disadvantages of different contract forms based on challenges and success criteria for the project. (Final decision on contract form is made by the steering group);Internal or external quality assurance;Internal approval in the Steering Group (IG1)
Clarify needs - Room and Functional Program (P1)
Clarify needs - Room and Functional Program (P1)

Assess opportunities for government subsidies;Contact Sports and Recreation and start the process to apply for gaming funds according to routine for gaming funds in projects;Contact Husbanken and start the process to apply for Husbank subsidies according to routine for Husbank subsidies;Identify relevant subsidy funds for energy and environmental measures according to Routine Description for projects that apply for and receive subsidies for energy and environmental measures
Clarify needs - Room and Functional Program (P1)
Fill out checklist for assignment description;Review checklist with KS leader
Concept development and processing - Sketch project (P2)

Startup meeting;Assessment/adjustment of program;Update project organization;Update progress plan and calculation;Update stakeholder analysis with measures;Write communication plan;Contact with building/regulation;Proposals for constructions;HSE in sketch project;Environmental review and environmental plan;Environmentally directed health protection (kindergartens and schools);Consult HVO and AMU;Ground and property acquisition;Universal design;Compilation of sketch project
Concept development and processing - Sketch project (P2)
Contracting of architect and consultant services, possibly contractor
Prepare competition basis;Announce competition(s);Evaluate bids;Hold contract meeting;Draft and sign agreement document;Agreement on HSE coordination execution (KU)

Follow up/update stakeholder analysis with measures;Contact ICT;Apply for government subsidies (if relevant);Update environmental plan;Prepare/update HSE plan;Calculate life cycle costs (LCC);Send framework application;Prepare distribution key (if not 100% VAT compensation);Prepare preliminary project drawings;Send advance notice to labor inspection;Present case to the council for people with disabilities;Contact AMU;Update planning documents;Compile preliminary project;Conduct uncertainty analysis;Update calculation

Prepare competition basis;Quality assure competition basis;Announce competition(s);Evaluate bids;Hold contract meeting;Formulate and sign contract document
